IX.iii.1.A.5.f
.
Terminating Protected Pension When Income Exceeds the Limit
If Section 306 Pension or Old-Law Pension is terminated because income exceeds the limit, current-law Pension is effective and payable January 1
st
of the next year, if the beneficiary is otherwise entitled.
Note
:  The award of current-law pension is not an election and is not subject to
38 CFR 3.31
.
